column4: Qualcomm's patent deals aim to ease Apple  regulator tensions  exec says
column5: Qualcomm Inc has broadened its use of a lower-cost licensing model for the next generation of mobile data networks  a move that could help in contentious talks with two customers including iPhone maker Apple Inc  the wireless tech company's patent licensing chief said on Monday.

column4: Qualcomm's patent deals aim to ease Apple  regulator tensions  exec says
column5: April 30 Qualcomm Inc has broadened its use of a lower-cost licensing model for the next generation of mobile data networks  a move that could help in contentious talks with two customers including iPhone maker Apple Inc   the wireless tech company's patent licensing chief said on Monday.
